rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
Use right_command+;/' to cycle through running applications (like command+tab).
Use right_command+h/l to switch tabs in an application.
Use right_command+j/k to switch windows of the foreground application .
Tab + uiyo to shift + arrow keys
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
(1/2) Do not auto close brackets & quotes when holding fn
Command + Esc to Command + ` (for window switching)
Command + Shift + Esc to Command + ~ (for reverse window switching)

simple_modifications.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+.

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+/
